alert.note: Alert for Carter; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 6:27PM CDT until May 16 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in east Tennessee... Unicoi County in east Tennessee... Southern Carter County in east Tennessee... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 727 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tusculum, or 9 miles east of Greeneville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Erwin, Jonesborough, Banner Hill, Midway, Pine Crest, Unicoi, Roane Mountain State Park, Hampton Creek Cove State Park and Limestone Cove. This includes Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 26 and 49. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
